Intent: Display structured tabular data with sorting/filtering
Web: DataTable with TanStack Table, sortable columns, pagination
Electron: Same as web, consider virtualization for large datasets, column resize
SwiftUI: Table view with custom columns, no native DataTable equivalent
React Native: FlatList with custom row component, or react-native-table-component
Flutter: DataTable widget from Material, DataColumn and DataRow, sortable
Accessibility: Column headers as buttons for sort, aria-sort, row selection announced

Intent: Display collection of items as visual cards
Web: CSS Grid with Card components, responsive columns, gap spacing
Electron: Same as web, grid layout, consistent card sizing
SwiftUI: LazyVGrid with adaptive columns, GridItem for sizing
React Native: FlatList numColumns prop, or custom grid with flexWrap
Flutter: GridView.builder or Wrap widget, SliverGrid for sliver context
Accessibility: role='list' on container, role='listitem' on cards, focus order

Intent: Display items in vertical scrollable list
Web: ScrollArea with list items, hover states, click handlers
Electron: Same as web, virtualized list for performance, keyboard navigation
SwiftUI: List with ForEach, NavigationLink for detail navigation
Flutter: ListView.builder for performance, ListTile for items

Web: ResizablePanelGroup horizontal, list left and detail right
Electron: Same as web, remember panel sizes, optional split window
SwiftUI: NavigationSplitView with sidebar and detail columns, iPad native
React Native: Custom split view or react-navigation drawer with content
Flutter: Row with Expanded ListView and detail Container, responsive
Accessibility: Selection announced, detail content live region or focus shift

Web: Custom tree with Collapsible, indentation levels, expand icons
Electron: Same as web, keyboard navigation (arrows), memory of expanded state
SwiftUI: OutlineGroup with DisclosureGroup, native outline style
React Native: Custom TreeView component with recursive rendering, Animated
Flutter: ExpansionTile widget, nested children, custom indent
Accessibility: aria-expanded on nodes, level indication, arrow key navigation

Intent: Display media items with preview and lightbox
Web: CSS Grid of images, Dialog lightbox on click, navigation arrows
Electron: Same as web, native image loading, full-screen option
SwiftUI: ScrollView with LazyVGrid, fullScreenCover for lightbox
Flutter: GridView with Image widgets, showDialog for preview, Hero animation
Accessibility: Image alt text, lightbox focus trap, arrow key navigation

Web: Drag and drop library (dnd-kit), horizontal columns, card items
Electron: Same as web, native feel drag feedback, column persistence
SwiftUI: Custom implementation with drag gesture, no native Kanban
Flutter: Custom drag-drop or flutter_draggable_gridview, Column layout
Accessibility: Drag announced, drop zones described, keyboard drag support

Web: Custom Timeline component with vertical line, event nodes
Electron: Same as web, time-relative formatting, infinite scroll up
SwiftUI: Custom VStack with line, time formatting, no native Timeline
React Native: Custom Timeline component, FlatList with custom rendering
Flutter: Timeline package or custom Column with positioned line, CircleAvatars
Accessibility: time element for dates, ordered list semantics, chronological order

Web: Card grid with large numbers, trend indicators, sparklines
Electron: Same as web, auto-refresh consideration, chart libraries
SwiftUI: LazyVGrid of stat cards, custom chart views, SwiftCharts
React Native: Card components with Text for stats, react-native-chart-kit
Flutter: Card widgets with large Text, fl_chart for sparklines
Accessibility: Metrics as text not just visual, trend direction described

Web: Calendar component with event dots, click to view day details
Electron: Same as web, sync with system calendar consideration
SwiftUI: DatePicker or custom calendar grid, EventKit integration
React Native: react-native-calendars or custom calendar grid, gesture handling
Flutter: TableCalendar package or custom GridView, event indicators
Accessibility: Grid navigation, date announcement, event count per day

Web: Recharts or Chart.js in ChartContainer, responsive, accessible
Electron: Same as web, chart libraries, export options
SwiftUI: Swift Charts framework, native chart types, accessibility labels
React Native: react-native-chart-kit or Victory Native, responsive sizing
Accessibility: Alternative data table, patterns not just color, aria-label descriptions

Web: Card with Avatar, name, metadata, action buttons
Electron: Same as web, hover card for quick preview, click for full profile
SwiftUI: VStack with profile content, AsyncImage for avatar, navigation
React Native: Card component with Image and Text, Pressable for navigation
Flutter: Card widget with Column, CircleAvatar, action buttons
Accessibility: Heading for name, image alt text, action buttons labeled

Intent: Stream of recent actions or events
Web: ScrollArea with activity items, relative timestamps, infinite load
Electron: Same as web, real-time updates via IPC, notification badges
SwiftUI: List with activity items, .refreshable, background refresh
React Native: FlatList with activity items, real-time via WebSocket, pull refresh
Flutter: ListView.builder with activity tiles, stream updates, refresh
Accessibility: New items announced via live region, time relative formatting

Web: List of result items, highlighting matched text, faceted filters
Electron: Same as web, keyboard navigation, recent searches
SwiftUI: List with search results, .searchable integration, highlight
React Native: FlatList with highlighted results, custom search bar
Flutter: ListView.builder with results, TextField search, highlight matches
Accessibility: Result count announced, live region for updates, clear match indication

Web: Table with sticky first column, feature rows, check/x indicators
Electron: Same as web, horizontal scroll, sticky headers and first column
SwiftUI: Custom Table or Grid layout, horizontal scroll, sticky elements
React Native: ScrollView horizontal with custom table, sticky first column
Flutter: DataTable with fixed first column, horizontal scroll
Accessibility: Column headers associated with cells, feature names as row headers
